page.title: 11OUT OF MY WINDOW I CAN SEE
page.content: I look out of my{bedroom window and I have not got a good view! I look and I can see the train tracks and the {trains}going past. When I look over the wall where the{trains}pass I can see Somers Town but that is not a good view either. Everything is just the same. There are not many trees. I can see blocks of flats and boys and girls playing in the park. When I look to the other side I can see people coming home from work or getting into their cars and children riding by. When night comes I look from my window and it is pitch black. I see the{trains}go past with lights on and sparks coming from the tracks and cars flash past with their headlights shining.
